# bulk-user-enrollment

```bash
# Checkout
git clone https://github.com/xbtsw/bulk-user-enrollment.git

# Install dependencies
cd bulk-user-enrollment
npm i

# Create 15000 students and enroll them into wei_test course as role "Student"
node index.js -t 15000 -o wei_test -r Student

# Apply generated files with GearButtonâ„¢>Users>Bulk User Management
```
